page.title: 07GENERAL SERVICES
page.content: There are no doctors in our area and most local people go to Doctor Marshall in Birstwith. Some people go all the way to Harrogate, Ripon and Pateley Bridge to go to the dentist. We have a school dentist who treats children at school and visits twice a year to do this. There is a mobile library which goes though Burnt Yates on a Thursday and other villages on various other days around the area every week. There is only one shop which is in Birstwith and situated next to the school. Most people buy their food from Harrogate. There is a garage in Burnt Yates at the bottom of Bar Hill next to the New Inn. The garage sevices cars,and petrol is avalable. The times of the buses that go through Burnt Yates are 0954hrs 1329hrs 1829hrs. People who don't travel by buses travel by cars.
